name: Elegy (Martyn)
description:
You are Earth's mightiest hero, the first and last line of defence. You are sent into the middle of two clashing dimensions, Darkness with the sole purpose of destroying everything in its path and humanity's hope, the Elegy.

Being the only source of light in the Darkness, will you bring hope back to the Elegy? Or will you be consumed by the darkness?

DESCRIPTION

Elegy takes the classic Atari title Berzerk and combines it with inspiration from the world renown artist Hedda Sterne and her work. Created in four weeks for a SAE Brisbane Game Jam.

Note: There is currently a number of small bugs. Major ones being Level 5 bugs out and stops at a black screen and score text isn't visible after level 1.

CONTRIBUTIONS

Creator - Martyn Evans

ASSETS

Artwork created by Hedda Sterne. https://heddasternefoundation.org/
